Articles.Content: I was gonna use this on the forums since they were so slow, but they maintenanced it before I had my chance. Oh well, might as well post it anyway. Feel free to use it in any slow-website endeavours you may have.
How did you take that out of my computer without me hearing you??

How did you take that out of my computer without me hearing you??

I sent Jeb over. Since he doesn't breathe, and he's quiet as a sedated mouse, he seemed like the perfect guy to take modems out of computers. I've already got a small fortune in modems from KSC computers, Command Pods, and oddly enough, Desk Lamps.
